review: I bought two of these on sale (19.??). One works well in a room next to my WiFi hotshot.  The other lags a buffers in a different room with a weaker signal.
author: V. Miles "Track by track fan"

review: Meh. Slow. Had problems during first time installation.I wish I could return it.
author: Rick

review: I would love to review my fire tv stick. Except that I ordered it 2 weeks ago and it's still sitting in an Amazon warehouse. I contacted Amazon about what takes so long, and they default response extended my prime membership by a month. That's all great, but I'd rather have the item I purchased.
author: Jeff DePalma

review: For the price it gets 5 stars. Would like improved plex app in performance and price.
author: Loso

review: This is a very convenient and useful device that allows access on your TV that previously I could only do on my iPad or computer. Love it and recommend it.
author: Jim Grignon
